entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
